text.text: WHAT: Click on the My Portfolio tab to view and download the project files you have created. You create project files in three ways. Write in Word or Excel documents that are part of Supporting Materials. Write in a Key Takeaways or other forms. Upload images or other files.
WHY: View your project’s files in one place. See which files you’ve worked on. Download and save materials as documentation of what you have done.

HOW: Click on the My Portfolio tab. A box will open. Click on the name of an ERB section and you’ll see a list of files on the right. Check the date on "Modified by" to see which files you’ve worked on. Click on the Export button to save the files to a location of your choosing on your desktop or laptop.
